Unicode Test File (Updated)

Basic Latin: Hello World!
Extended Latin: cafe resume naive
Accented: cafe resume naive (corrected accents)

Greek: Alpha Beta Gamma Delta Epsilon Zeta
Cyrillic: Privet Mir (Hello World)

Japanese:
  Hiragana: (This is a test)
  Katakana: (This is a test)

Chinese: (Hello World)

Emoji: Hello world! Have a great day!

Math symbols: infinity = approximately 3.14159...
              sqrt(2) approximately 1.414

Arrows: left right up down double arrows: left right

Box drawing (extended):

Currency: $100 100 100 100 100
